alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Marshall; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 12:29PM CDT until March 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Little Tallahatchie Canal at Etta near New Albany For the Little Tallahatchie River...including Etta near New Albany... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Tallahatchie Canal at Etta near New Albany. * WHEN...From this evening to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Extensive cropland flooding is occurring, mainly between State Highway 30 and County Road 46. Water is beginning to cover the unpaved portion of Union County Road 47 near Mud Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 24.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
